game_description: Become a pilot! Immerse in WW1 aerial combat like never before in a captivating VR experience. Be a pilot during the Great War in Warplanes: WW1 Fighters. No matter whether you prefer arcade games or flight simulators ‚Äì a variety of options will let you adjust the game to your preferences. EXPERIENCE WW1 IN VR! ‚óè Fully customizable flight models ‚Äì from arcade to simulation based on aerodynamics. ‚óè Additional options affecting gameplay ‚Äì enabling manual takeoffs and landing, aggressive AI, disabling HUD and more. ‚óè Realistic graphics and amazing performance (90Hz on Quest 2). ‚óè 20 playable planes ‚Äì from light scout planes to heavy bombers. ‚óè Two campaigns with hundreds of missions set in diverse locations, seasons and time of day. ‚óè Build a squadron ‚Äì upgrade and customize your machines. ‚óè Gain medals and upgrade your skills to manage your base more efficiently. ‚óè Single-player, PvP and Co-op multiplayer modes.
Languages: English, French (France), German, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Spain), Ukrainian
review_1: Hands down the best game on Oculus! Great community of regulars who I have come to admire and respect for their flying abilities and fair play without drama. Developers‚Ä¶please, please, please‚Ä¶create a Flares only team death-match. Also‚Ä¶a new map of a ww1 city to fly around during Flare mayhem is the most requested new aspect from all the regulars. We seem to be losing people and a new map, would breathe new life into this amazing game! Thanks, Vin Fiz Vortex
review_2: Best game that I own. This game really recreates WWI and it‚Äôs planes. It is the most realistic you can get with a VR flying game. There is a variety of different WWI planes and they all have different aspects. The concept is simple: destroy the enemy aircraft or zeppelin without getting shot down. Also, the controls are very easy to get used to. Depending on the game mode that you are playing on, you get more money (to spend on planes or upgrades) and it gets harder to play. Example: if you play on realistic mode, then there is a +30% money increase and it‚Äôs easy to fly the plane and there is a marking on top of each plane to tell you which one is the enemy. But if you play the Real War mode, then its a +110% money increase but it‚Äôs way harder to fly the plane and you have to identify the enemy planes by there paint jobs. I definitely recommend this game to anyone, but mostly the people who always have wanted to fly a plane. Definitely get.

review_5: My 70 year old dad has never enjoyed video games, but I had him try playing thos game, and he got hooked. The only thing I don't like about the game is that I get motion sickness if I play too long.
